overview: Desert and Rocky Mountain Bighorn Rams III is a series of fantastic hunts throughout the past three years (1997 - 1999) and includes two years of hunting scenes from Alberta Canada's auction tag.  You'll see George Harms take a state record desert ram in California, and a world record CA Bighorn with a bow.  Bighorn 3 also follows Gary Hansen's #3 state record Idaho Bighorn hunt, and through Oregon for a CA Bighorn.  Mark Almgreen takes a great desert sheep with a muzzleloader, Ann Palmer shoots a great desert ram in Arizona, and we'll see a pistol hunt that completes all four methods of hunting.  With two additional Bighorn scenes, Bighorn III highlights nine outstanding hunts and closely focuses on field judging rams between 160 and 208 Boone and Crockett points.
title: Bighorn Rams 3
